Event.modelVersion: (string|null) Model version identifier reported by the backend for the response that produced this event (when available).
Event.id: (string) Unique identifier for this event instance.
Event.timestamp: (number) Event timestamp as a numeric value; exact units/representation are runtime-defined.
Event.author: (string) Who produced the event (e.g., 'user', 'model', or an agent name).
Event.invocationId: (string) Identifier for the overall invocation/run that produced this event.
Event.interactionId: (string|null) Optional correlation identifier for grouping events; semantics are implementation-specific.
Event.branch: (string|null) Branch identifier/path used when the runtime forks execution paths (hierarchical branch lineage).
Event.longRunningToolIds: (array[string]|null) Set of long-running tool IDs associated with this event (unique items).

content.role: (string|null) Producer role for the content (must be either 'user' or 'model' when set).

parts.text: (string|null) Plain text content for the part (may include code as text).
parts.thought: (boolean|null) Indicates this part is a model 'thought' when provided by the model/runtime.
parts.thoughtSignature: (string|null, base64url) Opaque signature associated with thought content (when provided).

inlineData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the media (e.g., image/png).

fileData.fileUri: (string|null) URI reference to the media object.
fileData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the referenced media.
fileData.displayName: (string|null) Optional label/filename for the referenced file.

videoMetadata.startOffset: (string|null) Optional start time offset of the video segment.
videoMetadata.endOffset: (string|null) Optional end time offset of the video segment.
videoMetadata.fps: (number|null) Optional frame rate of the video provided to the model.

level.description: (enum|null) Media resolution level that controls how media is encoded/tokenized.

mediaResolution.numTokens: (integer|null) Requested sequence length/token budget used to encode/tokenize the media input.

codeExecutionResult.output: (string|null) Captured stdout/stderr and/or failure details from execution.

functionCall.id: (string|null) Identifier used to correlate this function call with its corresponding response (when provided).
functionCall.name: (string|null) Name of the function/tool to execute.
functionCall.args: (object|null) Structured JSON object containing the function arguments.

partialArgs.jsonPath: (string|null) JSONPath (RFC 9535) pointing to the argument location being streamed.
partialArgs.nullValue: (string|null) Indicates the streamed value is null (e.g., 'NULL_VALUE').
partialArgs.willContinue: (boolean|null) True if more fragments for this jsonPath are expected.

functionCall.willContinue: (boolean|null) True if additional messages will continue this function call.

functionResponse.willContinue: (boolean|null) True if the tool will produce more responses (generator/streaming style).

scheduling.description: (enum|null) How the runtime should schedule delivery of this response.

values.SILENT: (string) Do not surface the tool response as user-visible content.
values.WHEN_IDLE: (string) Deliver when the model/runtime is idle.
values.INTERRUPT: (string) Deliver immediately, interrupting current generation if needed.

inlineData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the returned media.
inlineData.data: (string|null, base64url) Inline media bytes for the returned media.

fileData.fileUri: (string|null) URI reference to the returned media object.
fileData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the returned media.

functionResponse.id: (string|null) Identifier linking this response to the corresponding functionCall (when provided).
functionResponse.name: (string|null) Name of the function/tool that produced this response.
functionResponse.response: (object|null) Structured JSON object containing the tool output.

actions.skipSummarization: (boolean|null) If true, indicates this event should be excluded from compaction/summarization.
actions.stateDelta: (object) Delta/patch to apply to session/agent state as a result of this event.
actions.artifactDelta: (object) Mapping of keys to integer deltas (per schema: additionalProperties are integers).
actions.transferToAgent: (string|null) Requests a handoff/transfer to another agent by name/ID.
actions.escalate: (boolean|null) Signals an escalation (e.g., to a human or higher-level handler).

compactedContent.role: (string|null) Producer role for the compacted content (when set, 'user' or 'model').

inlineData.data: (string|null, base64url) Inline media bytes (if summary includes media).
inlineData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the inline media.

fileData.mimeType: (string|null) IANA MIME type of the referenced media.

actions.endOfAgent: (boolean|null) Signals the agent run should end after this event.
actions.agentState: (object|null) Snapshot/metadata representing the agent’s internal state at this point.
actions.rewindBeforeInvocationId: (string|null) Signals rewinding runtime state to before a specific invocation ID.

Event.partial: (boolean|null) True when this event is a streamed/partial chunk rather than a complete event.
Event.turnComplete: (boolean|null) True when this event marks completion of the overall interaction/turn.

finishReason.description: (enum|null) Why the model stopped generating output for this response.

Event.interrupted: (boolean|null) True if generation was interrupted (cancelled, superseded, or interrupted by runtime).
Event.errorCode: (string|null) Short error identifier/category for failures during event generation/handling.
Event.customMetadata: (object|null) Free-form key/value metadata for application-specific extensions.

usageMetadata.promptTokenCount: (integer|null) Total number of tokens in the prompt input.
usageMetadata.candidatesTokenCount: (integer|null) Total number of tokens in the generated candidates.
usageMetadata.toolUsePromptTokenCount: (integer|null) Tokens contributed by tool outputs used as model input.
usageMetadata.thoughtsTokenCount: (integer|null) Tokens counted as model 'thoughts' output (when applicable).
usageMetadata.cachedContentTokenCount: (integer|null) Tokens from cached content used for the request.

trafficType.description: (enum|null) Traffic type for this request (when reported).

modality.description: (enum|null) Which modality the token count refers to.

liveSessionResumptionUpdate.newHandle: (string|null) Handle representing resumable state that can be used to reconnect.
liveSessionResumptionUpdate.resumable: (boolean|null) True if reconnecting/resuming from this point is supported without losing state.
liveSessionResumptionUpdate.lastConsumedClientMessageIndex: (integer|null) Last client message index included in the resumable state.

inputTranscription.finished: (boolean|null) True when transcription for the segment is complete.

outputTranscription.text: (string|null) Transcribed text from model audio output.
outputTranscription.finished: (boolean|null) True when transcription for the segment is complete.

Event.avgLogprobs: (number|null) Average log probability across generated tokens when logprobs are enabled.

cacheMetadata.cache_name: (string|null) Resource name of the cached content entry (when active).
cacheMetadata.expire_time: (number|null) Unix timestamp when the cache entry expires (when active).
cacheMetadata.fingerprint: (string) Hash used to detect changes in cacheable contents.
cacheMetadata.invocations_used: (integer|null) Count of how many times this cache entry was reused (when active).
cacheMetadata.contents_count: (integer) Number of cached contents (active) or total request contents (fingerprint-only).
cacheMetadata.created_at: (number|null) Unix timestamp when the cache entry was created (when active).

citations.startIndex: (integer|null) Start index into the output where the citation applies.
citations.endIndex: (integer|null) End index into the output where the citation applies.
citations.title: (string|null) Title of the cited source.
citations.license: (string|null) License information for the cited content.

groundingMetadata.googleMapsWidgetContextToken: (string|null) Token used to render Google Maps contextual widgets (when Maps grounding is involved).
groundingMetadata.retrievalQueries: (array[string]|null) Queries executed by retrieval tools (when applicable).
groundingMetadata.webSearchQueries: (array[string]|null) Web search queries used for follow-up grounding searches (when applicable).

retrievalMetadata.googleSearchDynamicRetrievalScore: (number|null) Score (0–1) indicating whether web search could help answer the prompt.

searchEntryPoint.sdkBlob: (string|null, base64url) Encoded payload used by SDK/UI integrations.

groundingSupports.groundingChunkIndices: (array[integer]|null) Indices into groundingChunks used for this claim.
